titles.title: A resolution designating August 11, 2021, as "Hip Hop Celebration Day", designating August 2021 as " Hip Hop Recognition Month", and designating November 2021 as "Hip Hop History Month".
A resolution designating August 11, 2021, as "Hip Hop Celebration Day", designating August 2021 as " Hip Hop Recognition Month", and designating November 2021 as "Hip Hop History Month".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution designates August 11, 2021, as Hip Hop Celebration Day, August 2021 as Hip Hop Recognition Month, and November 2021 as Hip Hop History Month.
The resolution recognizes the contributions of Hip Hop to art and culture.
Finally, the resolution encourages local governments to build partnerships with local Hip Hop entities and other members of the creative arts and music communities.
